text: The Serrade Petit is a breed of cat that originated in France. ==History== Serrade Petits are a fairly recently developed breed, and have not yet been recognised by any cat breed associations. ==Characteristics== The Serrade Petit is a small cat, weighing only about . The coat is soft and short, and can be tan, orange or white. Serrade Petits have a lifespan of 11-15 years. ==References== Category:Cat breeds originating in France
title: Serrade Petit
